_sText:
(that's the max # of players)
NEW! VERSION 2!
Similar to breakfloor, but has:
  • Method of killing players who stay on the top level for longer than 20 seconds*
  • Boxes have damage filters that prevent them from being damaged by explosives (HE grenade does physics damage, and that's it.)
  • Various other changes (it's a surprise :D)
*ceiling begins to come down, crushing anything in its path. Note: crusher does not work on first round (shouldn't matter, anyway, since it starts a new round when a second person joins the game.) WARNING: This map uses point_servercommand to execute a script file (cfg/anticamp_cmds.cfg).
